member.name: T:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for buffer file operations (NDJSON strategy). Supports Options Pattern for .NET configuration binding.

member.name: F:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.SectionName
member.summary: Configuration section name for binding from appsettings.json

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.BufferFileSuffix
member.summary: Buffer file name suffix. Default: "_buffer.ndjson"

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.EnableBufferStrategy
member.summary: Enable buffer strategy for high-throughput write operations. Default: true

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.AutoCompactOnSizeThreshold
member.summary: Automatically compact buffers to Parquet when buffer size exceeds threshold. Default: false (use timer-based compaction instead)

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.BufferSizeThreshold
member.summary: Buffer size threshold in bytes before triggering auto-compaction. Default: 104857600 (100 MB) Only used if AutoCompactOnSizeThreshold is true.

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.DefaultCompactionSchedule
member.summary: Default compaction schedule (CRON expression). Default: "0 0 * * * *" (hourly) Examples: - Every 15 min: "0 */15 * * * *" - Every 30 min: "0 */30 * * * *" - Every hour: "0 0 * * * *" - Daily: "0 0 0 * * *"

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.DeleteBufferAfterCompaction
member.summary: Delete buffer files after successful compaction. Default: true

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.MaxBatchSize
member.summary: Maximum number of buffer items to batch in memory during compaction. Default: 10000 Helps control memory usage during compaction.

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.EnableStreamingCompaction
member.summary: Enable streaming compaction for very large buffer files. Default: false (load entire buffer into memory) When true, processes buffer in chunks to minimize memory usage.

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.UseHourlyPartitioning
member.summary: Use hourly partitioning for buffer files (year/month/day/hour/). Default: false (use daily partitioning) Recommended for high-volume scenarios (> 1M messages/day).

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.MaxConcurrentCompactions
member.summary: Number of concurrent compaction operations allowed. Default: 4 Higher values = faster compaction but more memory usage.

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.CompactingSuffix
member.summary: Suffix added to buffer files during compaction to prevent race conditions. Default: ".compacting" Files with this suffix are atomically renamed during compaction.

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.FailedCompactionSuffix
member.summary: Suffix added to buffer files that failed compaction. Default: ".failed" Failed buffers can be manually investigated or retried.

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.RetryFailedCompactions
member.summary: Automatically retry failed compactions on next run. Default: true If false, failed buffers remain with .failed suffix until manually handled.

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.ContinueOnCompactionError
member.summary: Continue compacting other buffers if one fails. Default: true If false, stops entire compaction process on first failure.

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.BufferOptions.ForceTimerCompaction
member.summary: Force compaction on timer trigger regardless of buffer size threshold. Default: false If false, timer-based compaction will only compact buffers exceeding BufferSizeThreshold. If true, timer-based compaction will compact ALL buffers regardless of size.

member.summary: Enable automatic file rotation when MaxFileSize is exceeded. Default: false (manual management)

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.ParquetOptions.EnableFileSizeMonitoring

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.ParquetOptions.CompactionMemoryBudget

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.RetryOptions.MaxDelayMs
member.summary: Maximum delay between retries in milliseconds. Default: 30000 (30 seconds) Caps the exponential backoff delay.

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.RetryOptions.Strategy
member.summary: Retry strategy: Fixed (constant delay) or Exponential (increasing delay). Default: Exponential

member.name: P:LakeIO.Configuration.RetryOptions.EnableCircuitBreaker

member.summary: Duration in seconds the circuit stays open before attempting to close. Default: 60 seconds

member.name: T:LakeIO.LakeContext
member.summary:
Provides methods to interact with Azure Data Lake Storage, supporting JSON, Parquet, and CSV file formats. This class implements the Facade pattern, providing a simplified interface to the underlying specialized services. Thread-safe client caching ensures optimal performance for concurrent operations.
DEPRECATION NOTE: This class is maintained for backward compatibility. New code should use the specialized service interfaces (IJsonStorageService, IParquetStorageService, ICsvStorageService, IBufferStorageService) registered via ServiceCollectionExtensions for better testability, modularity, and maintainability.
